h1.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: normal; color: #8D6E63; letter-spacing: 2px; border-top: 1px solid #D7CCC8; border-bottom: 1px solid #D7CCC8; padding: 10px 0;

h2.content: font-weight: normal; color: #A1887F; background: linear-gradient(120deg, #EFEBE9 0%, #EFEBE9 100%); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 100% 40%; background-position: 0 90%;

code.block: color: #5D4037; background: #FAF9F8; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #EFEBE9; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #FBE9E7; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 10px; color: #8D6E63; font-size: 14px; border: none;

styles.quote: border: none; background: #FFF3E0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 15px; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #8D6E63; font-style: italic;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border-radius: 8px;
styles.link: color: #A1887F; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #BCAAA4; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #EFEBE9;
table.header: background: #FAF9F8; font-weight: bold; color: #8D6E63; border-bottom: 1px solid #EFEBE9; font-size: 1em;
